short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mojodex: Your digital assistant for easy meeting recaps, quick follow-ups, and reduced mental load by handling tedious tasks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Mojodex Chrome Extension is a complementary interface to the iOS, Android apps and the web application.

How to use Mojodex?

1. Download the app:
iOS: https://apps.apple.com/fr/app/mojodex/id6446367743
Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.hoomano.mojodex_mobile

2. Create your account and delegate your first tasks.

3. Enjoy the Mojodex Chrome Extension to use the result in your CRM, email, or any of your favorite business apps.


What is Mojodex?
Better than auto-transcript, typing assistant and chatbots.
83 seconds is all it takes to delegate a meeting recap.
Use your voice to quickly tell what's important, so you don’t have to write them down by hand. You have more time for other conversations.

Expertly crafted meeting recap in seconds
Get a special report from your talking notes without having to write anything. Just talk, and it turns into a neat summary you can say 'okay' to.

Uniform summaries for 100% of your conversations
Make all your meeting notes, from in-person chats, phone talks, and video calls, neat and easy to read without any hard work, thanks to Mojodex. This way, they're simple to look at and use next time!


Now is the time to redefine your work.
With typical 3x productivity improvement, start a new way of working today. With Mojodex, it’s never so easy.

Effortless Meeting Summaries
Capture the essential points from every meeting using simple voice commands, saving you time and energy.

Instant Report Generation
Automatically generate organized and comprehensive meeting reports, allowing you to easily review and share your notes.

Proactive Action Plans
Receive suggested action plans based on your meeting summaries, helping you stay on top of tasks and drive results.

Personalized Customer Insights
Stay informed with up-to-date information on your clients, enabling you to build stronger relationships and close deals effectively.

Seamless Workflow Integration
Mojodex easily integrates with popular CRM platforms and other tools, creating a streamlined experience for busy professionals.

Boost Productivity and Focus
Spend less time on tedious tasks and more time building meaningful connections with clients, enhancing your performance and efficiency.
